arStrings.szText:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill grants your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} Critical Strike Damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Casting a {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 /3.75|1%+|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
